title: Global variables in Katalon Recorder
description: In test automation, sometimes multiple test cases might require   the same values. Instead of manually duplicating the same set of   values across multiple test cases, you can create global variables   to reuse the same values across test cases. This saves time and   reduces maintenance efforts as projects increase in complexity.   From version 5.6.0 onwards, you can use the Global Variable     Profile feature in Katalon Recorder (KR) to help you   automate tests with ease.
